alert.note: Alert for East Turnagain Arm (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 3:18PM AKST until November 18 at 11:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKST SATURDAY FOR THE PORTAGE AREA... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile at times. * WHERE...Eastern Turnagain Arm, including Portage. * WHEN...Until 11 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...No additional snow is expected during this event. Reduced visibilities will be caused by winds lifting and blowing transportable snow already on the ground.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
